'use strict'
exports['RSA-SHA224'] = exports.sha224WithRSAEncryption = {
  sign: 'rsa',
  hash: 'sha224',
  id: new Buffer('302d300d06096086480165030402040500041c', 'hex')
}

  hash: 'sha256',

}
